mapper.sql: a.dict_id AS "dictMeta.id", dm.name AS "dictMeta.name", a.category_id AS "category.id", c.name AS "category.name", a.value_id AS "dictValue.id", dv.original_value AS "dictValue.originalValue", a.original_value AS "originalValue", a.score AS "score", a.openid AS "openid", a.nickname AS "nickname", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.id AS "id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
LEFT JOIN sys_user uu ON uu.id = a.update_by LEFT JOIN mod_item_category c ON c.id = a.category_id LEFT JOIN mod_dict_meta dm ON dm.id = a.dict_id LEFT JOIN mod_dict_value dv ON dv.id = a.value_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ope_human_marked_dict( dict_id, category_id, value_id, original_value, score, openid, nickname, update_date, id, create_by, create_date, update_by, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{dictMeta.id}, #{category.id}, #{dictValue.id}, #{originalValue}, #{score}, #{openid}, #{nickname}, #{updateDate}, #{id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE ope_human_marked_dict SET dict_id = #{dictMeta.id}, category_id = #{category.id}, value_id = #{dictValue.id}, original_value = #{originalValue}, score = #{score}, openid = #{openid}, nickname = #{nickname}, update_date = #{updateDate}, update_by = #{updateBy.id} WHERE id = #{id}
